content: Roman Milky has marked this topic as resolved.

Hello Translators! Just a quick update - the survey is ready for translation, and I'll be sending each language team a PM with the link for the SurveyHero Translation interface. It's a relatively simple interface, where each question and response is displayed with a text box below it for entering the translation.

SurveyHero also offers automated translation for either the entire survey or individual questions - which you can then edit (because automatic translation is still ROUGH). Here's a link to a quick video walkthrough of the platform - https://youtu.be/sBzLqoX_lo0 - and if you have any questions working through the process please let me know!
While there's a Russian translation already, could you call volunteers to check it? An additional pair of eyes won't hurt.
@Yoh Deadfall after it's entered into the Survey Hero system, I'll share the editing interface with you and the others for extra eyes.
